settings.name: partsSaleList
settings.select: a.[SellOrderCode], dbo.f_Getcodename('备件销售类型',a.SellType) SellType, --c.DataName, a.[SellTime], a.[CustomerID], b.CustomerName, u.UserName Seller, a.[TotalAmount], a.[InputTime], a.[InputName], a.[AuditName], a.[AuditTime], a.[BillState], case a.BillState when 0 then '未审' when 1 then '已审' else '已出库' end BillStateName, a.[Remark], a.IsOut, a.IsPay
settings.from: P_SellOrderHead AS a LEFT JOIN B_Customer AS b ON a.CustomerID = b.CustomerID LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON a.Seller=u.UserCode

settings.name: partsSaleDetail
settings.select: S.SerialID, S.SellOrderCode, S.SparePartCode, S.Price, S.Quantity, S.Amount, S.Remark, S.UpdatePerson, S.UpdateDate, B.SparePartName, B.SpellAb, B.Unit, B.Spec
settings.from: P_SellOrderDetail S INNER JOIN B_SparePart B on S.SparePartCode = B.SparePartCode

settings.name: carStockList
settings.from: A_AutoStorage a INNER JOIN B_AutoArchives b ON A.VIN=B.VIN LEFT JOIN base_Stock C ON A.StockID=C.StockID
